title.rendered: “IDF Targets and Neutralizes Launch Sites: A Strategic Response to Attacks on Kiryat Shmona”

content.rendered:
IDF spokesperson:

Two strike cycles within an hour; the IDF attacked launch sites from which shots were fired today towards Kiryat Shmona.

A short while ago, fighter jets attacked a launch site in the Al-Taybeh area from which launches were carried out towards Kiryat Shmona this evening. In addition, an aircraft attacked a launch site in the Arab El-Louiza area from which launches were also carried out towards Kiryat Shmona.

Earlier today (Tuesday), fighter jets attacked a military building of the Hezbollah terror organization in the Dabieen area and a terror infrastructure of the organization in the Aita Al-Shaab area.

Attached is documentation from the attacks: https://bit.ly/3TjL8OR

Earlier today (Tuesday), fighter jets attacked a military building of the Hezbollah terror organization in the Dabieen area and a terror infrastructure of the organization in the Aita Al-Shaab area.
